introduction.title: Roman Derlemenko
introduction.intro: Hi! My name is Roman. I'm a software developer based in Kiev, Ukraine.
introduction.professional: I code primarily in PHP and JavaScript, but never afraid to get my hands dirty exploring all kinds of new tech, whether it be a new language, programming paradigm or anything related to the web.
introduction.personal: I'm interested in tech, psychology, philosophy and linguistics. Love learning new human languages and intolerant of stagnation.

profile.title: Profile
paragraphs: Motivated and enthusiastic PHP developer with an extensive commercial experience, eager to learn and improve constantly.

I am highly biased towards OOP paradigm, using the majority of common design patterns and writing clean, tested and well documented code. Having experience working with several major MVC frameworks, I tend to stick to PSR standards and follow other community conventions and guidelines.
I dedicate the majority of my free time writing personal projects, exploring new technologies and reading programming related literature.

jobs.outline: Developing and maintaining complex and scalable web and mobile applications with responsibilities ranging from creating back-ends from scratch and setting up servers and containers to writing and designing the front-end.
responsibilities: developing data synchronization and generation scripts
designing schemas and working with relational databases
refactoring and optimizing existing code base
setting up nginx, PHP-FPM, Ansible, SSL, AWS, Docker and cron
deploying applications and setting up continuous integration

jobs.outline: Developing new features for a Laravel powered back-end application.
Developing and maintaining hospitality management system and it's infrastructure.
